title: FIT File: A $3000 Garmin and a $350 COROS walk into a bar…
content:
﻿

For those not subscribed to the FIT File (it’s free!) via your regular podcast app or on YouTube, here’s a quick post with the highlights from the most recent episode.

In this episode, we chat about the new COROS Pace Pro, Polar Vantage M3, Insta360 Ace Pro 2 action camera, sponsorships in the action cam and beyond scene, and much more!

0:00 Ray’s Big Move
8:20 Insta 360 Ace Pro 2 and Sponsored Video Mess
28:00 Polar Vantage M3
33:55 COROS Pace Pro
47:18 Holiday Sales?
50:38 Garmin Marq Damascus Steel (Gen 2)
55:00 TrainingPeaks / IndieVelo Acquisition
1:11:29 What’s Next?

Thanks to Precision Fuel & Hydration, where you can get 15% off your first order.  Additionally, check out their free Fuel & Hydration Planner.

As a reminder, here’s where you can find the podcast:

  • The FIT File on YouTube.

And then for the audio-only version, you can find it here:

  • Apple Podcasts
  • YouTube Music
  • Spotify
  • RSS Feed

Thanks for listening!
author: Ray Maker
